function die(arr) {
    let i = 0;

    return {
        next() {
            let done = (i >= arr.length);
            let value = !done ? arr[i++] : undefined;

            return {
                value: value,
                done: done
            }
        }
    }
}
let arr = ['â˜ƒï¸', 'ğŸ¤£', 'ğŸŒˆ'];

let dieArr = die(arr);
console.log(dieArr.next());
console.log(dieArr.next());
console.log(dieArr.next());
console.log(dieArr.next());

{ value: 'ğŸ¤£', done: false }
{ value: 'ğŸŒˆ', done: false }
{ value: undefined, done: true }

OKï¼Œçœ‹çœ‹ç®€åŒ–çš„ç”Ÿæˆå™¨

function* die(arr) {
    for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        yield arr[i];

}
